price: Yɛadome wͻn; baabiara a yεnsa bεka wͻn no yεbεkye wͻn aku wͻn kum paa
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
